column2: In  2023  the  IRS  issued  a  rule  change  allowing  taxpayers  to  temporarily  apply  the  regulations  in  effect  prior  to

column1: 2022  related  to  U.S.  federal  foreign  tax  credits  as  well  as  a  separate  rule  change  with  interim  guidance  on  the
capitalization and amortization of R&D expenses. A cumulative one-time adjustment applicable to the prior period for
these tax rule changes was recorded in 2023.
